numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In major sports leagues, players of color make up more than 50 percent in many sports.
4. The number of head coaches of color is substantially lower than the number of players of color.
5. I wonder why the number of head coaches of color is substantially lower.
6. I ask whether race causes this lower number.
7. I ask whether other factors cause this lower number.
9. If race causes coaches to be mostly white, then this will seriously damage the country.
10. Every person in America deserves a chance to pursue any career.
11. Race must not play a role in this chance.
12. The headline is: Does race play a role in sports teams?
